gamerule.dashMultiplier: [Fabridash Resurrected] The value which will be used to multiply all dash values that are included in the mod's items.
text.config.fabridash_resurrected.title: §lFabridash Resurrected configuration
text.config.fabridash_resurrected.option: §7Unless you're a modpack developer, you probably don't need to change these options.

§7Enables / disables functionality of
the items included in the mod.

§aDEFAULT: Enabled

§7Enables / disables generation
of the Dash Globe.

§7Any treasure / loot chests generated
with this option set to §cDisabled 
§7will not contain the Dash Globe.

§aDEFAULT: Enabled

§7Enables / disables
fall damage immunity
after dashing.

§7If you dash into the air,
and this option is set to §aEnabled,
§7you will not receive any fall damage.

§aDEFAULT: Enabled
